TopicTitle: KSP is 40% Off On Steam Until 10 AM PDT

Articles.Content: What happened? I found out about this sale last night, I assumed that 10 AM PDT meant Pacific Daylight Time. It's 9:22 AM Central Time as I type this, so that should mean it is 7:22 AM Pacific time. Yet the sale is already over. I was going to buy a copy for my friends birthday today, so much for that.
It ended yesterday. I bought it Friday night (I live in Australia, figure it out), and it said the sale had eight hours remaining. Also, THANK YOU STEAM AND SQUAD!!!
